SELECT
FROM product a
AND a.productTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productTitle}, '%')
AND a.id = #{id}
and (a.code like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or a.productTitle like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%'))
AND a.createTime >= CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00')
AND a.createTime <= CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59')
order by a.${orderByField} ASC
order by a.${orderByField} DESC
order by a.createTime DESC
